titleStmt.title: The proceedings in relation to the tryal of Edward Fitz-Harris, at the Kings-bench-bar in Westminster-Hall, who stands indicted for high-treason which proceedings were on Wednesday the 4th. and Saturday the 7th. of this instant May, 1681 ...
titleStmt.author: Fitzharris, Edward, 1648?-1681.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
